tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to directory traversal when the Static middleware is used on Windows with the default filesystem configuration. Improper path handling allows specially crafted requests to escape the intended static directory and access arbitrary files on the system.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range and if you are using Windows.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/labstack/echo/v5` library to the patch version.
